briefdescription.para: Creates and initializes a BFileGameSound object from a BDataIO allowing you to play the specified sound data.

detaileddescription.para: This allows using BFileGameSound with BFile as well as non-file based storage (BMemoryIO, etc).
If looping is true, the sound automatically replays from the beginning once the end is reached. This is useful for playing background music in a loop.
You can specify the sound device to use by setting the device parameter. Setting device to NULL uses the default sound device.

parameterdescription.para: The place to get the data from.
Whether or not to repeat the sound in a loop.
The sound device to use to play the sound, use NULL for default.

briefdescription.para: Creates and initializes a BFileGameSound object from a file path allowing you to play the specified sound file.

detaileddescription.para: If looping is true, the sound automatically replays from the beginning once the end is reached. This is useful for playing background music in a loop.
You can specify the sound device to use by setting the device parameter. Setting device to NULL uses the default sound device.

parameterdescription.para: The path of the sound file on disk.
Whether or not to repeat the sound in a loop.
The sound device to use to play the sound, use NULL for default.

briefdescription.para: Creates and initializes a BFileGameSound object from an entry_ref allowing you to play the specified sound file.

detaileddescription.para: If looping is true, the sound automatically replays from the beginning once the end is reached. This is useful for playing background music in a loop.
You can specify the sound device to use by setting the device parameter. Setting device to NULL uses the default sound device.

parameterdescription.para: The entry ref pointing to the sound file on disk.
Whether or not to repeat the sound in a loop.
The sound device to use to play the sound, use NULL for default.

briefdescription.para: Fill a buffer with sound data.

parameterdescription.para: The number of bytes to fill buffer with.

simplesect.para: An integer indicating the current playback status.

parameterdescription.para: The sound is transitioning to or from a paused state.

briefdescription.para: Preload the sound file into memory so that playback won't be delayed.

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code if we were unable to communicate with the sound port.

briefdescription.para: Pauses playback if isPaused is true or resumes play if isPaused is false.

parameterdescription.para: true to pause playback, false to resume playback.
Determines how long the change in playback state should take to complete in microseconds. Set to 0 for an instantaneous change.
Already in the requested playback state.

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code on error.

briefdescription.para: Stops playback of the sound file.

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code on error.

briefdescription.para: Playback audio from a sound file on disk.
